GSD.description:
ext4: fix null-ptr-deref in ext4_write_info

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.75 by commit 533c60a0b97cee5daab376933f486207e6680fb7. For more details please see the references link.
